title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 429.3 - Submission of proposed plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 429.3 - Submission of proposed plan

State Regulations
(a) By July 15, 1980, and at a time specified
by the department in each succeeding year, each social services district shall
develop and submit a Family and Children's Services Plan, in such format as
prescribed by the department. (b) Such plan shall be developed by the district in consultation with other
governmental agencies concerned with the welfare of children residing in the
district, authorized agencies and other concerned individuals and
organizations. The plan, as submitted to the department for approval, and as
approved by the department, shall be made available to such agencies, individuals and organizations upon request. (c) Each district shall assure that its plan
is consistent with, and prepared in conjunction with, the district's Title XX
Plan, the district's Child Protective Services Plan, and any other State or

Federal planning requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
429.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
